[Skip to main content](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868065012636-How-do-I-connect-Checkfront-to-my-WordPress-website#main-content) * * * Learn how to [connect](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868065012636-How-do-I-connect-Checkfront-to-my-WordPress-website#h_01HAQMMCSBE312Z5WT5GD44WQS) _[Checkfront](https://www.checkfront.com/)_ to your _WordPress_ website with our step-by-step instructions. * * * ## **Accessing the features mentioned in this article** **Where can I find this feature using the top menu?** Manage > Integrations > Website Integration > WordPress **What more do I need to use this feature?** - [Admin](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868502205212) permissions to manage integrations. - [WordPress.com](http://wordpress.com/) account with a Business plan or a hosted website with the free [WordPress.org](http://wordpress.org/) software. - Abilityto copy and paste into your website code or have some helpful person do this for you! **Which Checkfront version supports this feature - classic items, classic products, or both?** - This feature is available in both our classic items version using classic items (Inventory > Items) and our classic products version using classic products (Inventory > Products).  → [Learn more about products](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868100241052) * * * ## Connecting to your WordPress website [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868065012636-How-do-I-connect-Checkfront-to-my-WordPress-website# "Back to top") ![WordPress](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868109002908) _[Checkfront](https://www.checkfront.com/)_ has created a plugin for _WordPress_ which enables you to generate a shortcode, paste the code into your webpage, and publish a booking portal for your Customers to reserve their items/products. To embed our plugin into your _WordPress_ website, follow these steps: 1. Search for the _[Checkfront](https://www.checkfront.com/)_ plugin in the _WordPress_ Plugin Directory. 2. Install and activate the plugin. 3. Enter your Checkfront Host URL in the plugin settings. 4. Generate the required shortcode through the plugin or from within your _[Checkfront](https://www.checkfront.com/)_ account. 5. Embed the generated shortcode in your _WordPress_ webpage. | | | | --- | --- | | ![Learn More](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868093223324) | Learn more about each step in our detailed setup guide here:
- [Introduction to the WordPress plugin](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868150051740) | | | | | --- | --- | | ![Learn More](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868093223324) | Learn about the Booking Widget as an alternative to the _WordPress_ plugin here:
- [Introduction to the Booking Widget](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868141953692) |
